title: virtual_machine
label: Virtual Machine
description: A virtual machine asset that emulates a physical computer system, providing an isolated environment for running applications and services.

diskModel.example: VMware Virtual Disk SCSI Disk Device

storageInfo.example: storageType: SSD, capacity: 500 GB, partitions: [C:\, D:\], usedSpace: 320 GB, freeSpace: 180 GB, healthStatus: Good

networkInfo.example: ipAddress: 192.168.1.105, subnetMask: 255.255.255.0, defaultGateway: 192.168.1.1, dnsServers: [8.8.8.8, 8.8.4.4], macAddress: 00:0C:29:7A:3B:E1, vlanId: 100, nicSpeed: 10000 Mbps, duplexMode: Full, ipv6Address: fe80::20c:29ff:fe7a:3be1/64, dhcpEnabled: false

assetDescription.example: Web server virtual machine for the Engineering Department, running Ubuntu 20.04.6 LTS on VMware ESXi, used by james.wilson to host production financial application services. Located in the DMZ security zone with IP 192.168.1.105.

assetGeoAddress.example: 123 Main Street, San Francisco, CA 94105, United States

otherInfo.example: hostedApplications: Apache HTTP Server 2.4.41, MySQL 8.0.33, financial-app-backend v1.5.2; backupSchedule: daily at 02:00 UTC; lastBackupTime: 2023-08-14 02:00:00; backupStatus: successful; snapshotPolicy: weekly full snapshot, daily incremental; lastSnapshotTime: 2023-08-15 00:00:00; monitoringAgent: Zabbix Agent 5.0; securityAgent: CrowdStrike Falcon Sensor 6.45; patchLevel: up-to-date as of 2023-08-14; vulnerabilityScanResult: last scan 2023-08-10, 2 medium, 5 low; complianceStatus: PCI-DSS compliant; notes: Scheduled for OS upgrade to Ubuntu 22.04 LTS in Q4 2023.
